text: CLOSE Among her many unforgettable qualities, Diana was known for her fabulous style. From ditching her gloves to speaking to the people through her clothing, Diana's flawless style lives on. USA TODAY Princess Diana and her mother - in - law, Queen Elizabeth II in London, August 4, 1987. ( Photo : Associated Press ) Princess Diana mystified and irked the British royals in life, but in death she changed them in ways that strengthened the monarchy by making them seem a bit more like her â€” warm, approachable, human.
